QuestData.Title: WANTED: Annihilator Servo!
QuestData.Description: WANTED: 1 Annihilator Servo to replace the failing one in my Long Neck Spectrum Analyzer.$B$BYou and your friends might want to check with the blood elves at Manaforge B'naar to the west to see if they have any spares. They seem to have a few arcane annihilators roaming about.$B$BPlease deliver the servo in pristine condition to Papa Wheeler at Area 52.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain an Annihilator Servo and deliver it to Papa Wheeler at Area 52 in the Netherstorm.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope that you're here concerning the wanted ad that I placed!
QuestData.RewardText: Woo hoo! Do you know how hard these things are to come by? It's not like I'm getting a regular shipment of parts out here.$B$BTell you what, as payment I want you to take something out of my box of junk. I'm sure there'll be something in there you can use. And if not, sell it.$B$BAlright, let me just take that off of your hands and get it into my Long Neck Spectrum Analyzer before the failing servo in it explodes!
